note: Information as of September 15, 2022. 'Allegedly' means another country charged a country, but the claims have not been confirmed by the country itself or impartial observers.
title: Current biological weapons activity
subtitle: Biological weapons are organisms or toxins used to cause death or harm through their poisonous properties.
sourceDesc: OWID based on ACA (2022), NTI (2022), and CNS (2008).
